headline: Norfolk Southern boosts industrial collaborations by enhancing infrastructure
summary: In the latest episode of the Bring It Home podcast, Norfolk Southern executive Stefan Loeb discussed the role of railroads in America’s reindustrialization. The post Norfolk Southern boosts industrial collaborations by enhancing infrastructure appeared first on FreightWaves.

headline: Norfolk Southern expands portfolio of certified rail-served industrial sites
summary: Norfolk Southern has expanded its offerings of certified rail-served properties for industrial site development. The post Norfolk Southern expands portfolio of certified rail-served industrial sites appeared first on FreightWaves.
